name: Gear up (itch) (standepuydt)
description:
Hi everyone,

Gear up is a top-down shooter where you play as a robot trying to escape an onslaught of enemies. You can upgrade your character to be even stronger and maybe survive long enough to win the game.

This is my first solo game, and I've worked on it for 2 days since I did not have anymore time... I hope you enjoy it!

PS: Feel free to listen to each song a little longer, they are all self-made and you might miss some of the best bits if you click away too soon!
